description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Major Features and Improvements

* Sending Calendar invitation
* Moving messages using IMAP
* Paging Support in Email clients
* Saving messages as Outlook Template (.oft)
* Context Timezone support in EWS Client
* Using search criteria and paging simultaneously for messages listing using the IMAP client
* Getting the division marker when working with MBOX format

All Changes

Features
EMAILNET-35183 - Support for saving MailMessage and MapiMessage to OFT format
EMAILNET-35136 - Sending Calendar Invitation Email

Enhancements
EMAILNET-35145 - Issue while having hyphen in domain name
EMAILNET-35180 - Leaving out Attachment Name while saving using Aspose.Email
EMAILNET-35128 - IMAP: Combination of MailQuery and Paging Support
EMAILNET-35144 - Support of context timezone for EWS client
EMAILNET-35151 - ImapClient: Provide option to Move Message
EMAILNET-35157 - Move paging parameters to separate class
EMAILNET-35169 - Provision of Getting MBox Marker

Bugs
EMAILNET-35133 - Attachments repeated wrongly in the MailMessage.Attachments collection while loading the EML
EMAILNET-35135 - Splitting PST does not split items at root folder
EMAILNET-35137 - Journal item raise error when opened in PST
EMAILNET-35138 - Task with 0 occurrences takes long time to save as MSG file
EMAILNET-35147 - Messages could not be read from MBOX
EMAILNET-35148 - Messages extracted from PST doesn't have Body information
EMAILNET-35149 - MapiNote re-saved using Aspose.Email API doesn't open in Outlook
EMAILNET-35152 - Msg to MHTML: Inline image missing in output
EMAILNET-35153 - MSG to MSG/HTML: Table borders and cells are missing in output
EMAILNET-35173 - Unable to set ReplyTo with uppercase letters
EMAILNET-35174 - EML to MSG: Message body is missing
EMAILNET-35178 - MSG to EML: API Halts while extracting calendar items from PST file
EMAILNET-35179 - EML->EML: Subject is lost
EMAILNET-35181 - Problem with Signed messages in presence of attachment
EMAILNET-35184 - Assigning weekly MapiCalendar recurrence to MapiTask hangs
EMAILNET-34834 - MailMessage.Save raises OutOfMemoryException for this HTML file
EMAILNET-35114 - Pop3Client.ListMessages raises exception with latest API
EMAILNET-35139 - Exception raised when Task with MapiCalendarWeeklyRecurrencePattern contains 0 occurrence
EMAILNET-35141 - MailboxConverter.ConvertPersonalStorageToMbox raises System.UnauthorizedAccessException
EMAILNET-35175 - EML to MSG raises Exception
EMAILNET-35176 - Daily, weekly and yearly recurrence pattern raise exception while adding to PST
EMAILNET-35177 - Detach Add Signature option raises exception with attachment
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
